name: UnofficialDeathNoteTrivia
0:
”Alexa, begin D. Note Trivia”
”Alexa, start D. Note Trivia”
”Alexa, open D. Note Trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: d. note trivia
des:
Death Note is an animated television series adaptation of the 2003 manga series Death Note. The series was directed by Tetsurō Araki and animated by Madhouse. 

 Death Note has a complex and cerebral storyline, handling of mature themes regarding morality and justice, along with the narrative progression and character development.

 Death Note indeed has lots of fans. But how well do you know Death Note? Can you score 10/10? Can you answer the questions of different difficulties? Try this skill and find out for yourself! 

 All the best to all the Death Note fans out there! Enjoy the game and try to achieve a high score. And compete with others to prove that you are a true Death Note fan.

Instructions
<> Repeat the question by saying, "Repeat".

<> Get help by saying, "Help".

<> Start the new game by saying," Start new game" or "New game".

<> To quit the game just say "Quit" or "Cancel".

Hope you will enjoy the game! Please rate and review this game.
Thank you!
